entries.femaleVariant: Welcome to N54 News. I'm Gillean Jordan.
A letter of protest regarding the apparent "resurrection" has been signed by religious leaders, human rights groups and Virtu 100 company CEOs.
This is an abomination born of unchecked vanity, technocratic arrogance, complete moral collapse...
Our position is clear – Saburo Arasaka's seizure of power is in violation of international law. International arbitration is absolutely necessary to--
Do we really want to live in a world where the rich and powerful can become immortal? Where they can continue to take from the poor – not only their livelihoods but even their bodies?
Night City residents are also making their voices heard. A protest outside of Arasaka's Night City headquarters has extended to its second day.
You aren't gods! You aren't gods! You aren't gods! You aren't gods!
But Saburo Arasaka has issued his response in similarly strong terms – there will be no appeasement.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="アラサカ社内部の出来事に関して、外部の方々にとやかく言われる筋合いはありません" t="What happens within Arasaka Corp. is the concern of no one except Arasaka Corp. employees." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="生を受けることに許可が必要ない以上、蘇ることも同様であると考えるべきです" t="I required no one's permission to be born, nor do I require it now to live once more." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="合意の上での身体の譲与は一種の寄付に分類することができ、殺人には到底値しません" t="The mutual and consensual transfer of one's own body can be defined in the law as an act of donation, far removed from the qualifications of murder." b="" a=""/>
Will the world accept Saburo Arasaka's argument and bend to his will? I'll ask our experts after the break.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="私が息子を殺めたなどという主張は事実無根――法的根拠もありません" t="Allegations that I murdered my son are completely unfounded and have no legal basis." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="殺人の条件は生物学的な死です。見ての通り、この体は生きています" t="Murder requires the biological death of the organism. But as you can see, the life in this body has not been extinguished." b="" a=""/>
Life is not for trade! Life is not for trade! Life is not for trade! Life is not for trade!
The world remains gripped by the revelation that Saburo Arasaka has returned from the dead in the body of his son, Yorinobu Arasaka.
